channel.title: This is what happens when you save a big number
channel.description:
Loaded WorldMap In (125 ms)... Demise PK'ing has been activated... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9 9999999999999999" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:461) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:282) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:125)
i saved a big number :) 17 9s in a row lol i tried to lower it alot but it still comes up with this, even though all those 9s i put in for an item are gone. i replaced them with smaller numbers like in the first place. help? :D im so close to finishing, id have it within an hour >.< if you know somebody who can help but that isn't you direct them my way! XD thanks.

item.title: This is what happens when you save a big number
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

The maximum value an integer can hold is 2147483647.

Read full topic
item.source: This is what happens when you save a big number
